metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31484 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
CPAN.pm before 2.35 does not verify TLS certificates when downloadingdistributions over HTTPS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.30 - 5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4
perl - 5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4
perl-base - 5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4
perl-debug - 5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4
perl-modules-5.30 - 5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.30.0-9ubuntu0.4').
